Name: Grand War : Rome
Description: Rome Empire War is a classic turn based military strategy in which the player will lead the army of the Roman Empire. The user is waiting for several campaigns, during which he will have to control the army with the help of well developed tactics and defeat the forces of opponents. The commander will have several types of combat units to choose from, each of which is suitable for a certain type of battles. In addition to participating in battles, the player will also have the opportunity to get acquainted with such legendary historical figures as Gaius Julius Caesar, Hannibal, Scipio, Carthage.

Name: World War 2 : Europe Frontline
Description: A historical approach to the subject of the Second world war. The player can participate in hundreds of military campaigns that unfolded in all corners of the globe during the period from 1939 to 1945. Join any army that participated in the global conflict. Depending on the user offers unique missions, different military equipment, and knowledge of the great commanders, which will help to identify weaknesses of the enemy.

Name: Last Hope TD
Description: A strategy type Tower Defense game on the theme of a Zombie Apocalypse. The player will join the heroes who managed to survive in this meat grinder. However, this is not finished, because the walking dead are coming from all sides. To destroy their waves of attack, the user would have to place various turrets in the path of mutants and to use the skills of the characters and their weapons. Correct tactics will help not only kill normal zombies, but also to resist the more powerful bosses.

Name: World Conqueror 2
Description: A global strategy, which takes place during the Second world war and the Cold war. The user becomes a direct participant of those events. It will have a variety of combat units, several dozen historical campaigns, and the most famous generals. After choosing sides of the conflict, the player can choose the commander and to get used to his role. Douglas MacArthur Georgy Zhukov, Charles de Gaulle, Erwin Rommel and other generals available here. The project has a good artificial intelligence of enemies, nice graphics and gameplay that will appeal to fans of the genre.

Name: Glory Of Generals 3
Description: A global turn based strategy in the setting of the Second world war. The player will control armies in land, air and sea battles of those years, characterized by historical accuracy. The user will be a lot of military units, various appliances. Each unit has its own features and benefits than to use in combat. In addition to these tools, the gamer will be able to enlist the support of more than a hundred generals capable of their actions ahead of any opponent.

Name: Steampunk Tower 2
Description: Continuation of excellent strategy, in which the main character, Lord Bingham will once again need the help of the player as commander. The game is built on gameplay the principle of Defense Towers. The user will be the head of the air cruiser, equipped with a large number of equipments produced by technology of steampunk. Each equipment will help protect the city from attacks of enemies. In the process of passing a gamer can strongly improve the available tools for effectively countering the enemy.
M:
Unlimited Gold Coins
Unlimited Gems
Unlimited Etherium(Increase When Spent)
Note: Mod Will Not Work For The Purchase Of Gold Coins And Etherium In The Store 'Resources'.

Name: Grow Empire : Rome
Description: A strategy, which will play not just for anyone, but for the most Julius Caesar. The famous Emperor wants to conquer all the peoples of Europe and make Rome its centre and stronghold, and you want to help him in this difficult matter. The player has a large army consisting of archers, infantry, cavalry, and siege towers. Also there are about thousands of buildings and structures that may be erected on the territory of the Empire. With such resources, the commander can conduct many attacks and capture 100 major European cities.

Name: Kingdom Wars
Description: Strategy type tower defense for Android devices. Her Kingdom was under attack guests from the dark world. Now it is in deadly danger and only the player can solve this problem. To do this, he will destroy the perfect the enemy using defensive structures and combat units. They will confront demons, undead, dragons and other monsters. Each type of soldiers and towers has special abilities that will help in the fight against otherworldly forces.
Note: Diamonds increase when spent, purchase coins in exchange of diamonds

Name: Tower Conquest
Description:
Tower Conquest is one of the best Tower Defence strategy, where the battles take place wall to wall. In the story, a resident of the village stumbled upon a portal to another world, from which then pushed the hostile evil spirits. The gameplay here is simple.On the left side of the screen is lock user, whereas the stronghold of the enemy is on the right.

Throughout the entire process in the Treasury of the player would drop your main resource, mana. Due to its you must hire peasants. They are armed with pitchforks and effectively confront living dead. After the destruction of the enemy forces, the villagers are sent to destroy the enemy base. Victory give valuable gold and provide more efficient types of troops.

Also the success of further use of various magic spells during the battle and upgrade features of the army and the castle. Tower Conquest is one of the best representatives of their genre. There are a variety of units, beautiful locations and exciting gameplay. All this makes the game a real gift for fans of the Tower Defence.
Note: Coins And Gems Increase When Spent

Name: Digfender
Description: A strategy game with elements of Tower Defense subgenre. In the story the user will be engaged in excavations numerous treasures under the ancient fortress. This place is rich on things like that, but production of treasure awakens ancient monsters begin to get out. To stop them, the user will have to build defensive towers. In the process of passing a gamer will improve as the tools for production values, and defenses through a variety of upgrades.
M:
Unlimited Gems
Unlimited Stars
Unlimited Relics
Maxed Tower Upgrades

Name: Stick War : Legacy
Description:
A strategy, which will have to manage an army of thin men - stikmans. This hero is very popular and visited many of the games of different genres. Now he has reached and strategies. The main objective here is to capture territories, create and improve settlements and army.

There are three levels of difficulty depending on which game process becomes easier or harder. As in any other similar strategy, there is need to establish a camp, recruit troops and labor and to extract resources. There are story quests, for which performance accumulates gold and experience. You should also fend off enemy attacks and to attack. The player must not only demonstrate the talents of a politician and the commander, but also to upgrade weapons, soldiers for the most successful course of battles.

Timely upgrade skills and weapons will give a distinct advantage in the struggle with the foe. Stick War : Legacy is a great example of a strategy that combines the familiar gameplay and unusual characters. This mixture will appeal to fans of the genre and fans of games about the thin men.

Name: World Conqueror 4
Description: Strategy for Android-devices in which user will become the captain and take direct part in the war. Choosing one of the countries-participants of the conflict, the player will begin the ascent to the heights of power throughout the world. To achieve success it is necessary not only to have efficient army, equipped with appliances, but also to establish diplomatic relations with other States. Also to help commander comes with many famous generals, each of which has its own strategy of warfare.
M:
Unlimited Coins
Unlimited Medal Points
Unlimited Industry Points
Unlimited Energy
Unlimited Tech Points
Unlimited Military Points

Name: Archers Kingdom TD
Description: Strategy type tower defense, where players have to protect a castle under assault by the skeletons and their evil master. Appropriate to destroy the enemy forces, you need to place towers and shoot skeletons from the bow the different types of arrows. There are many types of defensive structures, ranging from the catapult and ending with barricades and ice towers. All buildings can be upgraded, which will allow even more successfully to withstand hordes of enemies.

Name: Steampunk Tower
Description: Take charge of a huge steampunk tower and help the eccentric Lord Bingham protect his precious Etherium. Strategy in the style of the genre Tower Defence, which brings with it some fresh ideas. The game itself sends users to the culture of steampunk that should appeal to many gamers. The gameplay is to defend standing in the middle of the screen tower. With two sides to it come the enemy that must be destroyed. To do this requires by means of guns mounted on floors of buildings. In the process of passing the player will finish the floors and put them on the new guns, while the number of attacking enemies will increase as well.

Name: Plants Vs Zombies
Description: Battle with the mobs of zombies in a new and exciting battle. Fight off all attacks of the dead, and do not let them get into the yard. Create your invincible defense, think through tactics and build protective nuts, which for a long time will stop the advance of opponents. The game Plants Vs Zombies mod apk has good graphics and a large number of tasks and a variety of locations. On which you will meet many heroes, and as you progress through the game you will discover new plants that have unique abilities.

Name: Castle Creeps TD
Description: Very interesting tactical strategy in which you need to defend your big castle and not miss opponents in their possession. In addition to the construction of towers and improvements you are given a unique opportunity to use characters with a variety of super powers and super powers. Available as unique buildings and towers that you can build only for the resources that have been collected on the playing field. Beautiful graphics and a large number of tasks, familiar and intuitive control, a lot of enemies and heroes are waiting for you, create your kingdom and become the most powerful in the Castle Creeps!

Name: Parallel Space
Description: A handy utility for mobile devices on Android to create clones of applications for entry of them under different accounts. With its help, any user has the ability to make an independent copy, and at the same time to be in the same program with different accounts. The application functionality does not change, and his work will be stable. This feature will be very convenient for those who constantly uses a variety of social networks and email.

Name: Parallel Space 64 Bit Support
Description: Parallel Space 64Bit Support is a plugin for Parallel Space that lets you use this popular app on 64Bit devices, although it's important to keep in mind that this plugin doesn't offer any additional features. Its sole purpose is to help you use this app on the aforementioned smartphones.

Name: Lucky Patcher
Description:
Lucky Patcher is an android program that allows you to use the full version of many applications without buying a license. It's no secret that most games and utilities are only available in demos. And in order to use all possible functions, you need to purchase a key. But now you can bypass the system and gain all the privileges without spending your own money.

After installation, the program will scan all available applications on the device and display their full list. In the upper part, those of them (and highlighted in color) that are available for 'treatment from the license' will be marked. It will be pleasant also that thanks to Lucky Patcher there will be an opportunity to launch in offline those applications which earlier demanded connection to the Internet.

Easy control, intuitive interface - these are the parameters taken by the developers as a basis. Scanning applications takes a minimum of time, like applying a patch.

Name: X8 Sandbox
Description:
Most game modification tools require root access to Android phones. The X8 Sandbox is a tool that provides root access to applications commonly used to edit games. Essentially, this application is designed for mobile game penetration testing.

The X8 Sandbox allows you to install apps that require rooting without rooting the device. Because rooting your phone is not good for your device's warranty.

This application creates a virtual area to run applications that require root privileges. This is a very simple tool that anyone can use without changing anything on your phone. So no need to worry about using it on your phone.

A virtual machine is a program that works like a virtual computer. It runs on the current operating system - the host operating system - and makes virtual hardware available for the guest operating system. Guest operating systems, like other machine programs, run under the windows of the host operating system. For guest operating systems, the virtual machine is displayed as a real physical machine.

You can install multiple virtual machines on a real machine and are limited only by the available storage space. Once you have multiple operating systems installed, you can open the Virtual Machine program and select the virtual machine you want to start, start the guest operating system, and run it in the Host Operating System window, or run it in full screen mode.

Name: X8/F1 Launcher
Description:
The main reason why X8 Sandbox is not working in Android 12 is because the Android 12 system restricts background processes, resulting in the X8 Sandbox not being able to start, running stuck and other problems. Therefore, it is necessary to remove this restriction through the X8/F1 Launcher.

After installing the X8/F1 Launcher, Open it and click on the Repair button then follow the steps below.

1. Connect your phone to WiFi.
2. Open the X8/F1 Launcher, and according to the prompts, activate each permission switch and watch the video operation.
3. Go to phone settings-Developer options-Wireless debugging-Use pairing code to pair the device.
4. Slide down the notification bar to see the input box of the notification bar of the x8/F1 Launcher.
5. Enter the pairing code just displayed to complete the pairing.

After successfully repairing once, theoretically it does not need to be repaired again. If the X8 Sandbox is still stuck or running in the background is unstable, you can try to activate it again.

Name: Game Guardian
Description:
Many of us often used the Art Money program to youth. Therefore, the principle of the application Game Guardian for Android will be clear to virtually everyone. It is very easy to use and simple program that replaces the numeric values defined in the application.

All you need to you could easily work with the app is root access on your tablet or smartphone. The principle of operation is the easiest. You enter the value in the game that you want to change. The app finds it and changes for the desired number. The big advantage is that it successfully works with almost any game on your device.

As you can tell, the possibility of using the program Game Guardian is truly endless. You can assign your characters a millions of gold, resources and much more that you sometimes need in games. The most important thing is to make sure the application has been installed on your device memory and not on memory card.

Name: Adobe Photoshop Touch
Description:
Adobe Photoshop Touch is a mobile version of the popular graphics editor. Of course to a full analogue of the desktop version it does not hold, however, many useful features are still there. Making the camera, you can immediately start to process it.

As the senior counterpart, there is the possibility of working with layers and various filters that will provide a comfortable editing, even if the user first installed Adobe Photoshop Touch. The program's interface is very comfortable and perfectly sharpened by touch control. In the center is the area of the image, and the top and bottom tool.

The developers have done everything possible to make the user feel as comfortable as possible when editing, and added a cool feature called Refine Edge. This feature allows you to highlight the difficult parts in the pictures with the fingertips. Also worth noting is the dark Google Images, allowing users to search and download images directly from the app.

Appearance of the program is satisfactory. Dominated by dark colors, particularly black and gray. All elements of the program opens smoothly and beautifully, so in terms of performance here too, all at the highest level.

Adobe Photoshop Touch is a useful and convenient program for processing images of NAS smartphones and tablets. A large selection of tools allows you to quickly and efficiently edit images with all the facilities without using a personal computer.
